parameters.name: PropertyExtension
parameters.description: Value of the property extension to add to this face (see Remarks )

title: IFace2.AddPropertyExtension
description: Adds a property extension to this face.

parameters.name: PropertyExtension
parameters.description: Value of the property extension to add to this face (see Remarks )

returns: 1 if the property extension is added to the face, -1 if not
remarks:
This method does not support:
adding multiple property extensions to the same face.
faces obtained from reference surface bodies.
To use this method:
Declare the variable.
Assign the variable a value: float, integer, or string.
Call this method to add the value to the face.
NOTE
: SOLIDWORKS recommends that you use the
IAttribute
,
IAttributeDef
, and
IParameter
interfaces instead of this method. These interfaces provide more flexibility.
